Module WitchHunt
Package fr.sos.witchhunt.model.flow

Class ScoreCounter

java.lang.Object
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.flow.ScoreCounter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Visitor
public final class ScoreCounter extends Object implements Visitor

Class responsible for counting each player's score using the Visitor design pattern.

Keeps the accounts of the points obtained at each round by each player. Able to produce a scoreboard.

Can produce a ranking ordered by descending number of points.

Used to check whether the victory conditions are met.

Also polled by the AIs in order to choose a strategy based on their ranking and that of other players.

See Also:

    • getWinner

      public Player getWinner()
      Returns the winning player if there is one, null otherwise.
      Returns:
      true if there is only one potential winner (one player having the maximum score, the latter one being 5 or higher).

    • getPotentialWinners

      public List<Player> getPotentialWinners()
      Used to determine whether there is a winning player, or if the game is tied, or if nobody is close to the victory.
      Returns:
